website_summaries.verdict: This set of adapters is a good choice for someone who wants to spend more of their money on travel instead of travel accessories.
pros: Set of 5 adapter plugs that can be used in a number of different countries
Small travel pouch included to keep all the pieces together
cons: These adapters don't convert voltage, so make sure your devices accept dual voltage

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly!  Everything you could possibly need
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for a recent trip to Italy, and it worked perfectly. The set included two adapters that worked there (a 2 and a 3 prong). A great feature is the ability to plug two items (including one grounded) into the adapter at the same time. Also included is another 2 prong adapter with slightly thicker prongs, and the UK adapter with 3 prongs. Keep in mind, as the description says, these do NOT convert voltage, but will work fine with multi-voltage devices like phone and camera chargers. These are of excellent quality and are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described when used as directed.
customer_reviews.text: The set worked perfectly. We travelled to Italy over the summer. I brought all three adapter types that we would experience on the trip. All worked flawlessly. Just be sure to read the product descriptions and use the ADAPTERS accordingly and you won’t be disappointed. If you use them for uses not intended, you are gonna ruin things. The seller very clearly states what they are to be used for and what to avoid. They work perfectly and made my trip very enjoyable since I didn’t have to worry about charging my phones while traveling to Italy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Traveled with confidence we were covered for our electrical needs.
customer_reviews.text: We were traveling to Scandinavia and just not sure of which adapters would be needed. This travel adapter packet eased those fears and worked perfectly. Having two plugs on each one allowed us to charge everyone’s phones and the camera battery. Great price and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Duda

customer_reviews.title: Great if traveling to multiple regions!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you get four different types - which is a great value. I just returned from Italy where I used two different ones - a 2 and 3-prong depending on location. They worked great to charge my iPhone and use my curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: sdeel

customer_reviews.title: A great little set
customer_reviews.text: Works well all over the world. Well made, great little case to keep them all in. I just take the whole thing wherever I travel, it so easy and small to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Gal

customer_reviews.title: Must have travel add-on.
customer_reviews.text: On the run or busy travelling? these are necessary for your travel bag. They are solid and fit perfectly into my sockets.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Oeri

customer_reviews.title: simple
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is in individual pieces, its not bulky and you always guaranty that it will fit in the outlet. Also carry the piece you need rather than entire thing although it has a carrying pouch which is also great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just ordered more
customer_reviews.text: After paying twice this amount for a single adapter in an airport, and then finding this works better - I am ordering more. I like several things about the one here - it's compact and covers most countries, each adapter is clearly labeled, includes a travel case, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra F

customer_reviews.title: All in one converter sometimes does not stay sturdy on the wall plugin due to its weight
customer_reviews.text: Very portable. Work well. I always pack this set for my international travels. All in one converter sometimes does not stay sturdy on the wall plugin due to its weight, but this individual piece has no such issue. I also like to the carry-on case.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Good value; just be sure you don't need a converter first
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked great and was a good price. Since these do NOT convert voltage, just be sure your electronics accept dual voltage (mine all did, just saying as helpful advice) and be sure to flip the switch the voltage on your laptop brick, etc, if it doesn't automatically detect. iPhone 5+ charging blocks, and most laptop power supplies (most modern ones accept 110-240v), all accept 110-240v as far as I know, for example, which is really all I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Faricy

customer_reviews.title: Worked in *most* but not all European outlets
customer_reviews.text: Used for a trip to UK, France, Austria, Germany, and Belgium. In fact, left all but three adapters at home. UK adapter worked in every outlet we tried. European adapter(s) [one has larger diameter posts] worked in all outlets we tried except one flat, where the adapter could not insert into the recessed round outlet - the plastic body on this adapter was too large and interfered with some features on the outlet. Most outlets we encountered were CEE 7/1 or CEE 7/5 outlets that did not have these interfering features -- it was the CEE 7/3 (or "Schuko") outlets we encountered in a newer German flat that had the features on both sides which prevented this from being inserted.
customer_reviews.author: Meep Meep

customer_reviews.title: Convenient case and perfect converters for foreign travel.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for us on our trek through Europe, from London to France to Switzerland and then finally to Italy. We never had to worry about recharging our phones or other electronics. The carrying case was very convenient, too. It allowed us to throw it in our luggage without worrying about the pieces falling into tiny spaces to be lost for the rest of the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Works, but fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I am currently traveling Europe for six weeks, and purchased this adapter for the trip. Overall, it has been extremely useful. I like that it includes most of the common types of adapters needed. One problem is that the back piece fell off almost 24 hours after I started using it. A piece of plastic from the inside also became dislodged. I tried to put it back together, but it was a lost cause. The adapter still works, but I'm terrified that the little piece of plastic I left in London will haunt me one day and this thing will stop working. I wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Plugs labeled with countries they work in
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have each plug labeled clearly (white letters on black plug) for the countries they work in. Only ones I have seen that are legiblely labeled Good size, has nice carry container, covers everywhere I can think of going. Wirecutter recommended it for me. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jimb

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product, especially if you travel.
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick! My friend's dad visited the U.S. from South America and brought his older radio that used a different outlet. He was adamant of using his radio due to sentimental value rather than accept my offer to buy him an mp3 player. So I looked on Amazon and took a gamble with this product, voila it worked! And, should I travel to different parts of the world, I can bring this kit with me and it should work there too.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Italy Trip Saver
customer_reviews.text: We used it for my Italy trip over Christmas. We were able to charge our phone, iwatch and power banks. Even we stayed in 4-star hotels during the trip, no hotels have USB charging outlet as we normally have in US. Without this gadget, we would likely end up buying expensive converter gadget in Italy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Shawn

customer_reviews.title: All European Travel Adapter Set
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and anticipate the quality and usefulness of these adapters. At this point I haven't had the opportunity to use them and reserve the "5 STAR" rating until after our trip where they will be put to the test. If all is well then my finding and rating will reflect my experience.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN P.

customer_reviews.title: Plugs all the holes in your travel plans
customer_reviews.text: Does just what you need (worked flawlessly). My wife and I traveled to Europe for a 16 day vacation in May of 2015. Our trip took us through eight different countries, and I used three of the adapters that came with this set. I just wish I hadn't left two of the adaptors in one of the hotel rooms! Thankfully they were cheap enough that I could afford to buy an entirely new collection. If only the company would allow me to buy a single adaptor. I'm really glad they came with a little travel tote/bag, they would have easily been scattered about in my luggage if it wasn't for that small piece of forethought.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Vaessen

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a trip to Europe to the Mediterranean region. It worked with my laptop and chargers. The build quality was so so, and I had no problems with getting the plugs to work. The pouch was useful and kept thing organized and didn't take up too much space. I didn't want any of the complicated all in one adapters do to clearance concerns. I used the plugs in a with a power strip, I did not have an opportunity to test this with a wall outlet to see how it would hold though.
customer_reviews.author: Ecolometrics

customer_reviews.title: Used for Italy and they all worked
customer_reviews.text: I used these for Italy in hotels, B&B's, and a friend's home. They all worked. 2 of them are used like the every day US plugs for outlets with 2 prongs vs 3. The third with thicker prongs and a round base is used for electrical outlets for hairdryers that require upgraded electrical coding, at least in my experience this time. I was able to use the 2 ordinary ones for the most part but did need the third and was glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover all items I wish to use on my trip.
customer_reviews.text: This product can not be used on hair dryers or curling irons. Therefore I am returning the product. I will say it arrived on time and in excellent condition so a dive star rating for the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Great travel set
customer_reviews.text: These can stack if you want instead of carrying the whole bag. The fit is tight... as it should be on the outlets I've tried. A good set at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: ALF Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Traveling Size
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect traveling size. I used to have a different converter that was a lot bigger and more of a hassle to pack. This is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One trip dud
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the converter for my trip and it lasted 4 days. The converter would not connect to the US style plug - it just fell out. When it worked, it was very convenient. Unfortunately I missed the Amazon return date. If you're going to gamble, make sure you have time to gift it back if it dies.
customer_reviews.author: bitblt

customer_reviews.title: Not correctly labeled
customer_reviews.text: These converters look nice and actually work. I'm giving it 3 stars however, because they are not correctly labeled. I recently traveled to South America--the converter marked "Europe" and NOT "South America" was the one that fit. Thankfully, I took the entire set of converters with me on my trip or I would have been unable to recharge/use my electronic devices.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Priss

customer_reviews.title: Great Adapter Set
customer_reviews.text: Great adapter set. It's very convenient that each piece tells you where to use it. That meant that when I went to Europe, I only had to bring what I needed and not bring the whole set or try to guess. The case is very handy for storage. I can keep them all together with the rest of my stuff for travel. Nothing I brought on my trip needed a converter, so the adapters from this set were all that I needed. I would highly recommend this set to anyone planning international travel to multiple parts of the world at any point.
customer_reviews.author: maethorwen

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before I headed to the UK and was not disappointed. All the pieces fit nicely into the pouch that fits into the palm of my hand. They're all labeled for the appropriate country and worked when and where I needed them to work. My sister brought her own set that cost a bit more money and most of her plugs from the USA had to be forced into the sockets and forced out once she was finished using them. After two days of it, she would ask to use mine instead because the plugs would easily fit into the slots and settle just like normal instead.
customer_reviews.author: MJDubz

customer_reviews.title: A must need for traveling the world
customer_reviews.text: This is always in my computer bag to have on hand whenever I am traveling the world. Always ready for whatever plug I need.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Daley

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use. Can change back and forth from eu, uk, UK, and aus outlets. Just used it to go to london and brussels.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Not for recessed outlets
customer_reviews.text: Works fine in most outlets but it’s too wide for European recessed outlets, which is a big problem for me while traveling in Portugal right now. Thankfully I have another one that works perfectly, from the same company. They should know better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work in Brazil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my travel to Brazil. I told that Brazil uses the round prongs like in Europe. What I wasn't told is the outlet recess for Brazil plugs are angled so they don't accept the EU style rectangular plugs. So this set was worthless to me. I wouldn't consider this "worldwide" seeing as it doesn't support a major county like Brazil.
customer_reviews.author: Byran Zaugg

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Functional, Tiny and Neat
customer_reviews.text: The adapters came in a neat little zippered pouch, which was an added benefit. We pulled out the plugs we wouldn't need and then used the pouch for all the plugs we were bringing. (We had some extra plugs purchased previously). If you're new to traveling overseas you might think about bringing more than just one plug for each country/type of electrical system. Especially if you're traveling with a family with more than one electronic device. Then each person can charge their device(s) at the same time and there won't be any fighting over who gets to charge their iPhone first.
customer_reviews.author: Jette Shears

customer_reviews.title: Very well thought out
customer_reviews.text: This was part of my daughters birthday gift. Thing you they were going to need adapters to run some of their electronics when they went to Europe. Both of them were thrilled with the small package that everything went into. They are planning to just use carry-on bags for their holiday. They were also very pleased to see the labeling on the plugs so that they knew which country which plug was used for. That will be very helpful for future trips
customer_reviews.author: Highlander48

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I just spent a trip in the UK, France, the Netherlands, and Germany. I used these adapters with my iPhone and had no issues. I just plugged the phone brick into the adapter and the adapter into the wall or power strip. I do not believe these adapters adjust currency (hence their lower price), but for things like iPhones, the brick does that automatically. This package was compact. Beware, the pieces are small, so don't lose them!
customer_reviews.author: iReview

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if you travel a lot
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend if you travel a lot. Compact pouch about the size of an apple, can throw the whole thing in your bag if you're going on a multi-country/continent trip or if you are going somewhere with non-standard outlets. I took this along for a trip through Japan, Thailand, and Nepal. Stayed in many places in Nepal with varying outlet types and never had a problem with matching up the outlets to a converter.
customer_reviews.author: MashaMashaMasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Fit my needs perfectly. Compact and easy to take along. Lightweight. Contains all of the adapters you might need almost anywhere in the world. I replaced a set from many years ago which was much bulkier and included a voltage converter, which is almost never needed anymore since most things now can accept either 115v or 220v. So all you need are plug adapters. These fit perfectly and held the plugs tightly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Seiden

customer_reviews.title: Handy multi-adapter in single package.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for travelling to different areas. My trip included both Australian and european plugs. Pros - lots of versions without having to track different adapters. Cons - it does not give grounding but the power itself is fine. Also, it's a bit bulky when in a plug. Note, it is a plug adapter only and does not change the power voltage differences. But if your device is univetsal (says something like 100 - 240, 50/60) then you should be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: DSKslund

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, but should work as intended
customer_reviews.text: Bulkier than I expected. Have not yet used overseas, but should function as expected. Dual USB jacks are a definite plus. Does not have a transformer - will NOT change voltage.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: For world travels
customer_reviews.text: Simple, inexpensive and SMALL. Important if you are traveling around the world, as I do.
customer_reviews.author: John Beven

customer_reviews.title: My go to.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used others but these are small, work well in walls where others dangle and drupe.
customer_reviews.author: one world travel

customer_reviews.title: Used these on my trip to Italy. I stayed ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these on my trip to Italy. I stayed in hotels and apartments I rented from airbnb and I found that the adapter did not work everywhere I stayed. The prongs were too fat to fit into the holes. I'm guess it was an issue with whether or not some of the places had been recently remodeled. I would just say be careful of purchasing these if you think you will be staying in older homes... I was luckily my friend had an older style adapter because it would've been problematic had I been on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Raenard Dillard

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: does the job but wish it was more easy to identify that the pieces belong to the set
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Great adapters thayt worked perfectly in two differet countries
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use adapters that worked perfectly for us in both London and Italy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Works in Israel
customer_reviews.text: Works in Israel. I was looking for power adapters for traveling, and I found this pack. Very handy, tidy little package--I read conflicting reports about which one would work so I just threw the whole case into my suitcase. It takes up very little room. The one labeled "Most of Europe" was the one that worked for me in Israel. Looking forward to trying it out in other countries.
customer_reviews.author: Gail J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Really great. I've used these around Europe and Australia/New Zealand. I have a Macbook and an iPhone, so I just attach these plugs onto my chargers and then put it in the wall. Great for the price. Clearly labeled. Nice condensed carrying case. Great for backpacking when you don't want to carry around one of those giant universal adaptors. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: merange_nb

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a pouch with different adapters and covers most countries. Reliable and no issues
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Compact and seems great but....
customer_reviews.text: Great little compact set, has all you would need. I'm on a trip around the world and was short on space, this seemed great. First attempt was in Athens, Greece which worked great with the 1 of 2 European plugs that is in the kit. Attempted to use at my next stop Mykonos, Greece and both European adapters are too square/wide to fit into the deeply inset European plugs here. They would need to be angled almost like a diamond to fit and instead they are square. Therefore I cannot give this a good review as I physically cannot fit the adapter into the plug, therefore making them obsolete. So much for charging anything for the next 2 months...
customer_reviews.author: Meghan485

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I used this when I was in Ghana and Jordan, and they work. There was no three-prong, but that's fine, as it makes more sense to buy one when you're in the country you need to plug in at anyways for cheap prices. These work for short term stays in places, or for like phone chargers., but you can't charge a laptop with these.
customer_reviews.author: Etaz

customer_reviews.title: good set
customer_reviews.text: good set that comes in a nifty zip pouch that keeps them together. I am always losing one.
customer_reviews.author: C  Moore

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken in 3 pieces + one of the plugs (European) wouldn’t retract back all the way. Also, it doesn’t have the plug for Argentina, the one like the US, but on a diagonal angle. Disappointed! I’m returning it, as it’s broken.
customer_reviews.author: DannyMom

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss quality
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a two week trip to Europe, which used two different adapter plugs. One plug was fine. The other had a constantly loose connection and kept falling out of the outlet, to the point where we had to purchase a $30 adapter at our location because the connection was so bad.
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Used it on our recent Europe trip and it was working perfectly. Our plugs work with the converter and had no problems when I plugged it in the socket. Can't say how long the product will last with us before breaking down (hopefully a couple of years), but we were happy with the price we paid, as well as the free pouch that holds them all together. This is consistently in my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Travels

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty decent...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty decent.. the quality of the plastics isnt top notch
customer_reviews.author: Vin Cente

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Europe uses different adaptive systems so this selection was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These were used in one European country with no issues. Very useful set.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Worked well when it fit in the outlets.
customer_reviews.text: We used these for our trip in Switzerland. Unfortunately, many places had recessed outlets that were oval shaped, so the rectangle couldn't fit for us to plug in the converter. Thankfully we had another converter with us or else I couldn't have charged my camera battery.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Dean

customer_reviews.title: Universal but bulky
customer_reviews.text: While it's a clever design that supports any plug configuration, the size of this adapter was a bit big and bulky and had trouble staying plugged in to European (two round plug) outlets because of the weight / size. I probably would have been better buying individual adapters for the UK and Europe.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nonymous

customer_reviews.title: No bevelled edges cause problems for some outlets
customer_reviews.text: The "most of Europe" plug has the right pins to fit into Swiss sockets, but does not have bevelled edges so it cannot be inserted into the Swiss recessed socket. Other adapters work fine. Carrying case is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Dorokhine

customer_reviews.title: Works but can be a fight
customer_reviews.text: I took this set with me when I went to South Korea. It uses the round prongs. While the adapter worked, I would need to prop it up in weird ways in order to get it to work. Initially, I thought this might be an issue with the plug or the hotel itself but as we travelled around the country and stayed in multiple hotels, the problem continued. It was a bit more of a hassle than it was really worth, but like others have said, "It works." Just not really all that well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for your trip!
customer_reviews.text: It is LIGHT and will work in multiple places, including for my foreign friends when they visit me in the states. Awesome! Shipping was fast, no complaints in the least. Traveling tip: most days you will want to plug more than one thing in at once, phone + chromebook...whatever it is. This product is a one at a time...not always practical for a 5 hour night of sleep! Just my wizened advice. :)
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Niece who is just leaving today for Italy and will be there for several months doing a semester abroad. I hope there will not be any issues.
customer_reviews.author: John Inza

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on my trip to Iceland recently. The plug worked perfectly and the different plugs are clearly marked as to which country they are used for. My only wish is that they could combined all of the plugs together into one contraption and you can just select which one you want from that.
customer_reviews.author: Van Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great in all the countries I've traveled to. They are small, and love that they have a little case. Cheap so I don't worry about losing them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Worked in Italy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, we were able to charge all of our devices while on vacation in Italy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy adapter kit
customer_reviews.text: Handy little adapter kit. The only issue I saw with the European adapters was that they are smooth on the sides. They could use some kind of lip on them to make them easier to unplug from the recessed plug holes that many European outlets have. They work, the fit is good and the carrying case is nice and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate Fish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break
customer_reviews.text: good thing I checked first. Some metal fell from inside. Scared to use it anymore as it could catch fire or burn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome adapters. Too bad I keep losing them. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: nice little set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set; nice little travel bag. plan to use on upcoming cruise. my previous ones were round and seemed to never fit tightly into sockets, My daughter had some like this that worked fine. will update after use.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me in Europe
customer_reviews.text: Adapters didn't work, fit in the outlet fine but nothing would charge, past the return window time frame since I bought well in advance of travel so I guess they'll get tossed out. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Jose W

customer_reviews.title: A must have for travelers
customer_reviews.text: This little case has gone just about everywhere with me and I haven't had a single issue yet. The adapters aren't loose in the outlet and the carrying case is small and easy to travel with. Definitely recommended for anyone looking to travel because it's incredibly inexpensive for the quality product you get.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Really great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I traveled to Europe for a month and this handy doodad got me around nicely. Fit all of the plugs as advertised. My father used the Asian and South American converters without a problem. Would recommend this buy!!! Quality for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Did their job, no problems so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! We used the one for UK and for "most of Europe". It was nice that they included 2 for the "most of Europe" ones. Not sure why we would need the adapter for the US? My friend thought maybe if you had a European appliance you can use it? Anyway, great buy - nice little bag that holds them too!
customer_reviews.author: Soo J Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Iceland and needed an adapter. Instead of buying just one, I bought the set based on the reviews (and hope to travel to the other countries). The adapter for Europe worked great in Iceland for charging smartphones. I had no issues with fit at all. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AustinAmers

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it is the plug you really need, will not take 3 prongs like on a laptop.
customer_reviews.text: It was fine, although I was unable to use it in Ireland. I needed it so I could bring my laptop, but didn't understand that the adapter I was purchasing was not capable of taking a 3 pronged plug like what was on my computer. Luckily the resort we were staying at had one at the desk that they sold to me for $5 that someone else had left behind.
customer_reviews.author: cathy j

customer_reviews.title: Every adapter we need with a handy storage case.
customer_reviews.text: This electrical adapter set will be perfect for our upcoming trip to Europe. Everything we need and it all comes in a convenient storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Will work with my converter
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Will work with my converter. Quick service. Love the compact size
customer_reviews.author: tck

customer_reviews.title: Small and lightweight with a great case, best out of all I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. They are so nice and lightweight, and the case is wonderful. I used these all over Europe, UK and Africa and they are definitely better than any others that I've tried...and I've tried plenty. Since almost all of our devices are dual voltage, we just need these little adapters for them.
customer_reviews.author: PackingToTravel

customer_reviews.title: Not all are available here. And, of course ...
customer_reviews.text: Not all are available here. And, of course, the one I was looking for is not included with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pili

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set. Just what anyone who travels to Europe and Asia needs. The set comes in a small case. Perfect to carry in your carry on, luggage or purse. The plugs seem to be made of durable plastic; they're very sturdy. I love the fact that it tells you where you can use each one.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the product yet. I bought it for an upcoming trip. However for the price; the case and the different plugs - that's why I gave it 5 stars. My review my change when I get back and it is tested. Updated 2/15/2015 I recently went to Laos and Burma. I was able to use this plugs to charge my phone and tablet.
customer_reviews.author: dtducla

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works
customer_reviews.text: Used on board cruise ship for portable oxygen concentrator (Inogen 5). Very few U.S. outlets in cabin and none near bed. Adapter worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JOE GOSS

customer_reviews.title: I went on a backpacking trip across several parts of ...
customer_reviews.text: I went on a backpacking trip across several parts of Europe. For the most part, these worked for me. One of them popped and killed a powerstrip I was using, but the rest seemed to work ok. You can tell they are cheaply made, but they seem to work ok for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: tjs07b

customer_reviews.title: Great product in a great value
customer_reviews.text: I used 3 of the adapters in a journey i made and it works perfectly with all the products i connected to it: cameras, smartphones, tablets, even a hairdryer. It was a perfect product considering the space it took on the bag and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Oswualdo Herrera

customer_reviews.title: This kit will be perfect for those special plugs we needed for Australia and ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I do a lot of international travel. This kit will be perfect for those special plugs we needed for Australia and New Zealand. Also perfect for our European trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use carrying case is a big plus.
customer_reviews.text: Love the small carrying case to keep in my travel bag. All items are well marked, some have fairly tight fit (better than being loose for sure) but all work great. Worked fine with my computer as well as iPhone with no warnings or other issues.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit well (or even at all) in recessed outlets
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the base is too wide to fit comfortably into the recessed outlets in some locations. When traveling in Norway and Iceland, we either could not use the adapter or had an extremely hard time getting the adapter out of the outlet at the end of our stay. I'm planning to buy an adapter like the ones we had previously purchased from REI that have always fit appropriately. Not being able to charge a cell phone is not something to risk.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: After locking at a lot of "universal" adapters that had ...
customer_reviews.text: After looking at a lot of "universal" adapters that had all of the plugs in one device, I opted for this set which has individual plugs, because most of the time I am traveling to just one or two countries and don't need a bulky all-in-one converter. Instead I need just the one adapter for "Most of Europe," for example. The adapters are all clearly labeled with the countries or regions they cover, too, so you don't have to remember which type of plug goes with which country. The carrying pouch is cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Adapters are good quality and light for travel. Used two of the four on our trip and they worked great. The package did not include a list of which adapters get used with which countries, that would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mjeans

customer_reviews.title: Works just as it should
customer_reviews.text: Used only the "Most of Europe" adapter but it worked fine in every hotel where we stayed. I'm deducting one star because the outlets in Switzerland have a third "grounding" hole. You can use the regular adapter, but a specific adapter for Switzerland would be nice (and safer).
customer_reviews.author: Audiobook lover

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, which is really well. And the case is great for travel. I pack the adapter I'll need for where I'm going as well as my phone charger and earphones in the case and put it in my bag. It keeps them all together in a compact way so that nothing gets lost. Also the names in the adapters are helpful so that you don't have to bring all of them with you.
customer_reviews.author: Dajeanne Washington

customer_reviews.title: High quality and having the case makes it easy to keep track of.
customer_reviews.text: The adapters here, although simple, are of good quality and should last many years. The pouch is great. In cases where a trip only calls for 1 or 2 adapters, the pouch is roomy enough to also contain a travel iPhone or Kindle charger. The zipper helps make sure small parts stay where they should.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a vacation to London, Paris, and Rome and they worked beautifully. As they are rather large, I was a bit worried that they would be too heavy and fall out of the outlets at first, but there were no problems. The all-in-one design is great as I didn't have to keep up with a bunch of little pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Cherra

customer_reviews.title: Useful and conveniently compact.
customer_reviews.text: Can be used in all countries. Comes in a convenient, small case.
customer_reviews.author: Mel D

customer_reviews.title: Travel Friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and travel friendly. I initially thought it is a volt converter; it is only a plug config. I needed it for a out-of-the-country travel. Comes handy that you don't have to worry what plug config whatever country you're traveling to. I ended up not bringing it with me and that was regrettable.
customer_reviews.author: msNinay

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit - And Works Everywhere I've been.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the travel kit prior to a swing through Asia and Europe. It worked well, feels like good quality, and seems to have all the power plug options covered. I especially like the carrying case, which makes it convenient to have the entire kit with me on trips. There were a lot of choices for power adapters and I had trouble picking one out. But I'm glad I picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm in Romania this past September. Seems like lots of other options/countries are included as well . They're labeled as to what county they work in - which is helpful for a casual traveler. I like that it all stores in one zipper pouch - and that I only have to take the one I'll need while the rest stay at home in the travel drawer where they will (hopefully!) not get lost!
customer_reviews.author: MLHinIndy

customer_reviews.title: To use these adapters, have strong hands!
customer_reviews.text: I used the European adapter - it worked well - EXCEPT that I absolutely could not pull the device out of the outlet. It fit SO tight that I had to get hotel staff (strong men) to get the plug/adapter released for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bug

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: This is great it has pretty much every adapter I have needed. They seem a little light, the plastic is probably not the best quality, but they work and for a fraction of the price of one of those all in one adapters, while taking up no more space in your luggage .
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: We've used this on 2 international trips to Europe. Works great. Doesn't get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: RWB

customer_reviews.title: The perfect kit
customer_reviews.text: The perfect kit for the person who likes to travel around the world and not worry about calling the reception of the hotel to get him a charger for his phone cause the one he has doesn't fit in the plug ; ) Solid and very nice packaging with that little bag. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas

product_meta.title: Ceptics International Worldwide Travel Plug Adapter 5 Piece Set, Great for Cell Phones, Battery Chargers, Laptops to Work in Most Countries
product_meta.description: Style:World Set W/ PouchInternational Worldwide Travel Plug Adapter 5 Piece Set, Great for Cell Phones, Battery Chargers, Laptops to Work in Most Countrie
feature_bullets: Set includes five Ceptics high quality polarized adapter plugs and each labeled with country or region

Works in the Countries including Armenia / Austria / Azerbaijan / the Azores / the Balearic Islands / Belarus / Belgium / Bosnia-Herzegovina / Bulgaria / Croatia / the Czech Republic / Denmark / Estonia / Finland / France / Georgia / Germany / Greece / Hungary / Iceland / Italy / Kazakhstan / Kyrgyzstan / Latvia / Lithuania / Luxembourg / Macedonia / Moldova / Monaco / Montenegro / the Netherlands / Norway / Poland / Portugal / Romania

Bahrain / Belize / Botswana / Brunei / Cyprus / Dominica / England / Ghana / Gibraltar / Grenada / Hong Kong / Iraq / Ireland / Kenya / Macau / Malta / Malaysia / Nigeria / Nothern Ireland / Oman / Qatar / Saint Lucia / Saint Vincent / Saudi Arabia / Scotland / Singapore / Sri Lanka / Tanzania / Uganda / the United Arab Emirates / Wales / Yemen / Zimbabwe

American Samoa / Argentina / Australia / China / Cook Islands / Fiji / Gilbert Islands / New Hebrides / New Zealand / Papua / New Guinea / Soloman Islands / Tasmania / Tonga / Tuvalu / Uruguay / Western Samoa
For international use with dual voltage appliances, Note: These adapters do NOT convert voltage. Accepts two prong US polarized or standard US plugs Set includes a convenient travel pouch
